overview.name: FreelanceProjectHub
overview.description: FreelanceProjectHub is a web application designed to streamline project management for freelancers and clients. It allows freelancers to manage multiple projects, track tasks, and monitor earnings, while clients can post projects, assign them to freelancers, and communicate effectively through a built-in messaging system.
overview.architecture: Full-stack application with React frontend and Node.js backend
overview.infrastructure: AWS-based infrastructure with S3, DynamoDB, Lambda, and API Gateway

instructions: 2. Install dependencies: npm install (in both frontend and backend)
3. Start development server: npm run dev
4. Build for production: npm run build
